Keith, and we are referring this matter to the regular HAEB Personnel
H&cement committee.
We have looked into the matter of the use of translators for program
origination. Hie University of Utah, which has been using translators
under special PCC authorisation, plans to file a petition for rulemaking
as soon as their data are complete. At that time, the MSB will file a
supporting petition.
At the present time we feel that the chances of getting the grant from
the USOE for the personnel inventory are slim. However, should such a
grant be forthcoming, we will certainly try to winnow out the information
you suggest about the availability of certain people for emergency loan
to stations needing assistance.
Cordially,
Harold g. Hill
